thread.title: Excellent hotel with impeccable service
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel with impeccable service - Review of St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ZX_Cheow
title: Excellent hotel with impeccable service
text: I would like to thank the guest experience manager Maira for the perfect arrangement for my honeymoon stay with the hotel. The chamber suite is lovely and has a great view over the St. Pancras station. Love the hotel and the guest experience team (Bertha, Felicia) !!!
